hero.name: Arragen A. Basilio
hero.education: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

about.title: ABOUT
content: I’m passionate about turning ideas into digital solutions through technology. With experience in programming, web development, and IT support, I enjoy building systems that make work smarter and more efficient. I love exploring new tools, frameworks, and technologies, always seeking ways to grow my skills and creativity. I’m driven by curiosity, adaptability, and the goal of making a meaningful impact through every project I take on.
I’m ready to share fresh ideas, stay dedicated, and keep learning as I work with any team or project.

items.title: BS Information Technology
items.company: University of Perpetual Help System DALTA

items.name: eXBatch Enrolment System
items.description: A web-based application designed to streamline the enrolment of batch numbers for Toll-supplied materials into the EXACT system. Offering role-based access for easy submission, approval, and tracking.

items.title: Outstanding in Practicum
items.description: Recognized for outstanding performance and professionalism during On-the-Job Training at Am-Europharma Corporation.
